## User Story
**As a** [type of user]  
**I need** [some functionality]  
**So that** [some benefit is achieved]

---

## Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin format)
```gherkin
Given [some context]  
When [some action is taken]  
Then [some expected outcome]

---
